title: What are the possibilities and limitations of magnetic fascination?
first_phrase: This text explores the possibility of simulation during magnetic fascination and the various phenomena that can be observed during this state. The author emphasizes that experimenters who have studied these phenomena and understand their regularity can easily identify attempts at fraud. The text also highlights the different periods and stages that subjects go through during magnetic fascination, as well as the various suggestions and changes that can be induced in them, such as changes in personality or the persistence of sensory or psychological suggestions after waking up. The last 200 tokens detail the process of fascination and how it dominates all the phenomena that occur during the different phases.

last_phrase: In conclusion, the history of mesmerism and magnetism is full of controversy and opposition from mainstream science. However, it is important to approach these practices with an open mind and examine the evidence objectively. While there may have been cases of fraud and sensationalism, there are also many documented instances of the therapeutic benefits of these techniques. It is up to each individual to weigh the evidence and consider their own beliefs and biases in order to make an informed decision about the value of these practices in modern medicine.
